data.title: Barry E. Davis, Sr. Obituary in Warrenton at Boyd's Funeral Service
data.meta_description: Boyd's Funeral Service | Warrenton, NC in Warrenton respectfully announces the passing of Barry E.  Davis, Sr. on July 25, 2020.
data.text:
Obituary For Barry E. Davis, Sr.

I'd like the memory of me to be a happy one. I'd like to leave an afterglow of smiles when life is done. I'd like to leave an echo whispering softly down the ways, Of happy times and laughing times and bright and sunny days. I'd like the tears of those who grieve, to dry before the sun; Of happy memories that I leave when life is done.

Mr. Barry E. Davis, Sr., of 778 NC Highway 43 in Macon, North Carolina departed this life on Saturday, July 25, 2020 at his residence. He is the son of Reverend Boldie Davis and Bettie L. Davis both of Macon, North Carolina.

Funeral services will be conducted Saturday, August 1, 2020 at 1:00 PM at Boyd & Royster Funeral Services in Warrenton, North Carolina. Burial will follow at Greater Lovely Hill Cemetery in Macon, North Carolina.

The body will be on view at the funeral home on Friday, July 31, 2020 from 11:00 AM until 5:00 PM.

Cherishing his memory is his “daddy”, Boldie, and his “momma”, Bettie; his children, Barry Davis, Jr., Mekhi Davis, Shari Davis, Beauty Davis; his unborn grandchild, Mei’Lani Davis; his four children of heart, Jayde Stevens, Marquey Jones, Dominique Jones, and Naya Young; their mothers, Melita Commack, Shona Harris, and Nikki Jones, and his forever friend, Almeco “Meco” Woodard; his uncles, Nathaniel Jones, Wardell Powell, James Davis, George Davis, Walter Davis, and Glen Davis; his aunts, Hazel Burton, Barbara Hargrove, and Carolyn Hill; along with a host of cousins, and friends.

Send flowers to the service of Barry E. Davis, Sr.
